statements: SELECT * FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT review_content FROM literature_reviews WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT author_name, publication_date, review_content FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT review_id, author_name, SUBSTR(review_content, 1, 50) AS short_review_content FROM literature_reviews WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_content LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews, YEAR(publication_date) AS publication_year FROM literature_reviews GROUP BY publication_year HAVING total_reviews > 2 ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data;
SELECT title, author FROM literature_review_data WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT commenter, comment_text, timestamp FROM reviews_comments ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE title = 'Introduction to Machine Learning';
SELECT title, author FROM literature_review_data WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, author, publication_date FROM literature_review_data WHERE author = 'John Doe' UNION SELECT review_id, commenter, comment_text, timestamp FROM reviews_comments WHERE commenter = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE year = 2021
SELECT title, author FROM literature_review_data WHERE author = 'John Smith'
SELECT * FROM research_collaborators ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT author, title, year FROM literature_review_data WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT name, institution FROM research_collaborators
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT author, title FROM literature_review_data WHERE title LIKE '%data%';
SELECT author, year FROM literature_review_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM updates_log WHERE action = 'insert' AND user_id = 101 ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT name, institution FROM research_collaborators WHERE institution LIKE '%university%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, author_name, publication_date, review_text FROM LiteratureReview;
SELECT name, institution, email FROM Researcher;
SELECT * FROM AccessLog ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT id, researcher_id, access_time, action FROM AccessLog WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT id, researcher_id, update_time, updated_columns FROM UpdateLog WHERE updated_columns LIKE '%author_name%';
SELECT id, author_name, publication_date, review_text FROM LiteratureReview WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, institution, email FROM Researcher WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, action, access_time FROM AccessLog ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT id, name, institution, email FROM Researcher WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT id, author_name, publication_date, review_text FROM LiteratureReview WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews;
SELECT title, author FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, title, author, publish_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University of Example';
SELECT review_id, update_date, update_content FROM updates ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM literature_reviews WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, content FROM literature_reviews WHERE content LIKE '%research%' ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University of Example' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_id_1, researcher_id_2 FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_id ASC;
